programmes.show_description: Pride Before the Fail: Hayley discovers she is within one credit of graduating college, but tries to fail so she can continue living at home.
Ready Player Gene: Animated comedy. Bob journeys into cyberspace when Gene's decision to spend all his savings on trying a new VR gaming arcade comes with disappointment.

programmes.show_name: New: The Real Housewives of Orange County
programmes.show_description: Reunion Part Two: Reality show. The reunion continues with the ladies questioning Tamra's intentions around sharing Jenn's old photo and a game of He Said, She Said.
Monaco Under the Stars: US mystery crime drama series about a garden club. The big night of the gala has arrived, but nothing goes as planned for Birdie, Catherine, Brett and Alice.
Shopping from home.
Where Stalks the Scarebear: Animated adventures with Scooby and the gang. The mayor enlists the Mystery Inc. gang to investigate the sightings of a mutant bear.
Wrath of the Krampus: Animated adventures with Scooby and the gang. A teenager vandalising a neighbourhood is attacked by a creature that leaves his hair white with fear.
Fright of Hand: Animated adventure series. Fred lives out his childhood dream as he and the gang go undercover at a private magic club being terrorised by a mutant rabbit monster!
Greece Is The Word: Animated adventure series. The gang travel back in time to ancient Greece and play unique roles in a Greek mystery involving the mythological spiderwoman Arachne.
Dale Mehmet: Barber and TV personality Dale Mehmet is going to be given five menus, each put together by a potential blind date.

programmes.show_name: Billie and Greg: The Family Diaries
programmes.show_description: Reality series. Greg takes Nelly, Arthur and their grandads on a trip to the seaside, and the Shepherds head to Greece for a long-awaited summer holiday.
Reality series. Courtney raises money for the charities who have helped her family by putting on a sports day fundraiser, and Amy and Billy enjoy a rare date night.
Slam Dunks and Friendship Flunks: US reality series. Larsa and Marcus host a charity basketball game where the ladies attempt to play ball, and Adriana's flatulence causes a stir.

programmes.show_name: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programmes.show_description: Tapas and Tattletales: US reality series. Sutton takes the ladies on a fabulous getaway to Barcelona where Garcelle fears supernatural houseguests.
Ollie: Ollie from London dates three women based on the mouth-watering menus they have prepared. Which lucky lady will be joining him on a second date?
Diags: Reality TV personality and TOWIE star Diags is given five menus put together by potential blind dates - whose menus will he choose, and will he want to see anyone for seconds?
Reality series. While some of the Essex crew go on a camping trip, Junaid goes for brunch with Dani and admits he's falling for Joe, but is worried Joe doesn't feel the same.

programmes.show_name: The Real Housewives of Orange County
programmes.show_description: Reunion Part Two: Reality show. The reunion continues with the ladies questioning Tamra's intentions around sharing Jenn's old photo and a game of He Said, She Said.
A Night at the Opera: US reality series. Adriana receives a therapy treatment and has an emotional out-of-body experience, and Guerdy discovers that Larsa betrayed her trust.

programmes.show_name: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programmes.show_description: Aches and Spains: US reality series. Hearts are racing after Crystal's medical emergency as Dorit opens up to Garcelle and allows the two to finally move forward.
Stephen Mulhern hosts a celebrity special of the classic game show with Kadeena Cox, Adam James, and Ellie Taylor all trying to guess well-known phrases in aid of charity.
Graham Norton welcomes office manager Shirley, financial management assistant Cameron, and police investigation officer Adele as they take on the Wheel for up to 50,000 pounds.
Find out how clever you are as Lee Mack presents the quiz where it doesn't matter how good you are at quizzes and where 100 contestants could win up to 100,000 pounds.
Reality show hosted by Olivia Attwood. The chefs let their hair down after a tough service with a night out in Barcelona, and Djordje keeps his options open when it comes to girls.
Boy's Best Friend: Brian finds himself bonding with his new girlfriend's son. Meanwhile, Peter, Quagmire and Cleveland go joyriding in Joe's new car.
And Then There's Fraud: Chris and Peter embark on starting their own baseball memorabilia business. Meanwhile, Stewie attempts to combat ageing with plastic surgery.
Disney's the Reboot: The network decides it is time to reboot the series, and three versions are shown to a focus group. The feedback takes everyone by surprise.
Girl, Internetted: Meg becomes internet famous, leading her and Peter on an adventure as they try to build her following. Elsewhere, Brian and Stewie revel in their new rental car.
The Hand That Rocks the Rogu: Animated US comedy series. Steve hopes to prove his responsibility to Francine by babysitting Roger's ex-tumour Rogu.
Enter Stanman: Stan becomes worried about the content of Francine's dreams - so Roger teaches him how to enter them, but things quickly go awry.
Putts-giving: Animated comedy. The Belchers decide to spend a Thanksgiving morning playing mini golf, but the empty course soon becomes a battlefield of emotions for the family.

programmes.show_name: New: The Real Housewives of Orange County
programmes.show_description: Reunion Part Three: Reality show. The reunion concludes with a heated face-off as the group discuss discrepancies surrounding the final dinner in Amsterdam.
The Fallow Period: US mystery crime drama series. Birdie, Catherine, Brett and Alice reckon with the aftermath of their gala after-party as new details about their night unfold.
Shopping from home.
Heart of Evil: Animated fun with Scooby-Doo and the gang. The gang work with the Blue Falcon and Dynomutt to stop a dragon robot that the Blue Falcon has wanted to catch for years.
Theatre of the Doomed: Animated adventures with Scooby and the gang. A brand-new theatre production is under threat by a mummified corpse from Mystery Cove's ancient past.
American Goth: Animated adventure series. Shaggy discovers that his friend Amelia has become a Goth and decides to become one too, but an evil plant monster has other ideas...
Omelettes Are Forever: Animated adventure series. The gang get caught up in international espionage and intrigue when they cross paths with a British secret agent on a mission.
Diags: Reality TV personality and TOWIE star Diags is given five menus put together by potential blind dates - whose menus will he choose, and will he want to see anyone for seconds?

programmes.show_name: Billie and Greg: The Family Diaries
programmes.show_description: Reality series. The Shepherds arrive home from their holidays, and tensions are high as the pressure mounts to get into the house before the new baby arrives!
Reality series. While some of the Essex crew go on a camping trip, Junaid goes for brunch with Dani and admits he's falling for Joe, but is worried Joe doesn't feel the same.
A Night at the Opera: US reality series. Adriana receives a therapy treatment and has an emotional out-of-body experience, and Guerdy discovers that Larsa betrayed her trust.

programmes.show_name: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programmes.show_description: Aches and Spains: US reality series. Hearts are racing after Crystal's medical emergency as Dorit opens up to Garcelle and allows the two to finally move forward.
Steph: Culinary-themed dating series. Steph from Manchester chooses three dates based on the menus they have planned. Who will she want to see again?
Imogen Thomas: Model, TV personality and former Miss Wales Imogen Thomas is given five menus put together by potential blind dates, but whose menus will she most like the looks of?
Reality series. Dan and Ella discuss Freddie as the camping trip draws to a close, Diags has doubts about Jodie moving to Essex, and Junaid questions Jordan's recent friendliness.

programmes.show_name: The Real Housewives of Orange County
programmes.show_description: Reunion Part Three: Reality show. The reunion concludes with a heated face-off as the group discuss discrepancies surrounding the final dinner in Amsterdam.
Farmer of the Opera: US reality series. Julia surprises Martina with an opera performance she will never forget, Guerdy puts Larsa on blast for broadcasting her cancer diagnosis.

programmes.show_name: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programmes.show_description: Ashing It Out: US reality series. Sutton holds a healing ceremony for the group where a shocking admission stirs up old grudges, and the ladies say adios to Spain.
Stephen Mulhern hosts a celebrity special of the classic game show with Alex Beresford, Sarah-Jane Crawford, and Joe Absolom all trying to guess well-known phrases for charity.
Chris brings his box to the table and tries to beat the Banker - join Stephen Mulhern to find out if he will take the 100,000-pound jackpot home to his family.
Lee Mack presents the ultimate leveller of a quiz show where it doesn't matter if you're not usually good at quizzes and where the top prize on offer is a possible 100,000 pounds.
Reality show hosted by Olivia Attwood. There is chaos in the kitchen that leaves Jean-Christophe with no choice but to shut the restaurant, and a tense debrief shatters the team.
Cat Fight: Fur flies when Quagmire decides to open a cat cafe. Brian does all he can to get the cafe closed down. Meanwhile, Lois decides to enrol Meg and Chris in church camp.
Peter and Lois' Wedding: When the wi-fi goes out in the Griffin house, Peter and Lois take the kids on a trip back to the '90s to hear about how they met and fell in love.
Adam West High: Brian's campaign to rename the school after Adam West is successful, and he feels compelled to run for mayor. However, he faces competition from Quagmire.
Who Smarted?: Worried that he's not smart enough for Hayley, Jeff undergoes an experimental intelligence enhancement procedure at the CIA.
